definition: letter of congratulations/greeting card (e.g. for New Year)

sentences.english: He didn't know he was enrolled until he received a congratulatory letter from the school.
sentences.chinese: 到學校寄來的賀函，他才知道自己被錄取了。

sentences.english: Your letter of congratulations gives me a great deal of pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 你的賀函帶給我莫大的歡喜。

sentences.english: He received as many as a hundred letters of congratulation on that single day.
sentences.chinese: 在那一天之內他所收到的賀函多達一百封。

sentences.english: I am very happy to have received your message of greetings.
sentences.chinese: 接到你們的賀函，我十分高興。

sentences.english: I am very happy and grateful to receive your message of greetings.
sentences.chinese: 接到你們的賀函，使我十分愉快和感謝。
